definitions.definition: Something that is below the layer that is on the surface .
examples: Before we could lay the flooring we had to lay a subsurface under it to keep it flat and support it.

definitions.definition: A surface which is a submanifold of another surface.

main_definition: Something that is below the layer that is on the surface .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , mathematics ) A surface which is a submanifold of another surface.
